content: pdf digital download crochet pattern - english only no refunds on digital products - all sales are final the mountain ridge cardigan is a sophisticated crochet cardigan designed to elevate any look crocheted in bulky weight yarn it s a quick crochet project the cardigan is crocheted in pieces from the bottom up and seamed together and it is then finished with the button-up collar the entire cardigan is worked in a simple stitch suitable for beginners and includes a step-by-step tutorial for size large on youtube men s sizes xs-5x written in standard american terms skill level easy yarn mary maxim titan bulky weight #5- 100% acrylic 80 yds/85g shown in light grey - https //shrsl com/3jqmo balls 9 10 11 12 12 14 15 16 17 hooks us l/11 8mm us k/10 5 6 5mm or size need to obtain gauge use code mjs15 for 15% off - https //shrsl com/36nzt materials - https //shrsl com/3fsrs tapestry needle stitch markers scissors measuring tape blocking pins - https //amzn to/3pkg3xj 4-6 blocking mats 24 x24 - https //rstyle me/+twztywoi5fpxd3mqptuepasteamer 5 wooden buttons 35mm - https //amzn to/3m1noup gauge 7 5 sts and 7 row equal to 4 in esc blocked with 8mm hook 6 sts and 4 row equal to 2 in ribbed pattern blocked with 6 5mm hook video link - https //youtu be/is2pjky61pm you are welcome to sell finished products from this design please reference mj s off the hook as the designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
